description: Source code for a to-do list application using the Ractive.js framework, defining UI behavior, data management, and event handling.

classes.name: Ractive
classes.description: Framework class used to create reactive UI components.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes a to-do item at the specified index.

methods.name: newTodo
methods.description: Adds a new to-do item with the description from input.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enables editing mode for a specific to-do item.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Finalizes editing of a to-do item, updating its description.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels editing mode for a to-do item.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets all to-do items as completed or active based on checkbox.
